channel.title: Cant play a priv server help
channel.description:
I have been tryint to play 508 servers and when i download them i get this error
"The system cannot find path specified." "'java' is not recognized as a internal or external command, operable program or batch file." Press any key to continue.
P.S I have lastest of java downloaded and all that etc if it is my PATH or CLASSPATH please tell me what to change them to or what the problem is iv asked all around sites and been trying to tackle it for weeks PLEASE HELP! thx
CLASSPATH:CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin;%CLASSPATH%; PATH:C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin/java.exe

programming, irc, cars

It will tell you everything about environmental variables.

Read full topic

item.title: Cant play a priv server help
item.dc:creator: @_mpire £mpire
item.description:
@_mpire wrote:

[quote=“ziplock, post:3, topic:234568”][quote author=enzroc21 link=topic=309274.msg2471175#msg2471175 date=1222995137]
I have been tryint to play 508 servers and when i download them i get this error

“The system cannot find path specified.”
“‘java’ is not recognized as a internal or external command,
operable program or batch file.”
Press any key to continue.

P.S I have lastest of java downloaded and all that etc if it is my PATH or CLASSPATH please tell me what to change them to or what the problem is iv asked all around sites and been trying to tackle it for weeks PLEASE HELP! thx

CLASSPATH:CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
PATH:C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin/java.exe
[/quote]

Your kidding right…?
jdk1.6.0_10
That will come out in a few months to a year… it hasn’t even came out yet why would your classpath be that??[/quote]
Actually the beta is out also, make sure the run.bat is looking for the right JDK as well my run.bat/compile.bat looked for jdk update 3 i had 5.

Read full topic

CLASSPATH:CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
PATH:C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin/java.exe[/quote]

Your kidding right…?
jdk1.6.0_10

Download jdk 6 update 7 please…

http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
